title: SPINGO Pipeline: Automated 16S Microbiome Analysis
description: An automated pipeline for processing 16S microbiome sequences using SPINGO (SPecies level IdentificatioN of metaGenOmic amplicons). The pipeline handles single-end and paired-end FASTQ files, performs taxonomic classification, and generates species abundance matrices for downstream analysis.

creators.name: Dinesh Palanimuthu
creators.affiliation: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology Delhi (IIIT-Delhi)
